Reviews.Title: great laptop for everything
Reviews.Author: davo
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice laptop ive had it over a year now and its been great in our home we have teenagers who use it for gaming and it never slows down it has many features too many to write need a good laptop toshiba satellite l745 s4310

Reviews.Title: Works well.
Reviews.Author: rick t.
Reviews.Content: Have not had any problems with it in a year of use.  Looked around a lot and still think I paid a lot for what it is, but I got tired of checking every computer add for the best deal and just ordered this one.  Fair price but not a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Don't but it!!!!
Reviews.Author: Zachary Zmoos
Reviews.Content: Worst computer ever. I've had it for about a year, and started having problems with it after 4 months, with very little use. Google the make and model of the computer and wireless problems. You'll find tons of people cannot use wi-fi anymore. I had to call Toshiba after not being able to access the internet via wi-fi, they replaced my wireless card, worked for a month, and has now stopped again. Piece of junk. By the way, I'm writing this review in my perfectly running iPhone.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Satellite.
Reviews.Author: Delores Heitzenrater
Reviews.Content: I ordered a new Toshiba Satellite and I received a used one.  I contacted the Seller and he didn't understand the problem I had with receiving a used Laptop.  The transaction is now in dispute with the Credit Card Company.  I realized as soon as I turned it on that it was used and turned it off.  I am waiting to send It back and have since replaced it.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba Satellite L745-S4110 14" LED Core i3-2350M 2.3 GHz 4GB DDR3 500GB...
Reviews.Author: cruzan magic
Reviews.Content: just as described it was perfect did the job now i can rest easy knowing my car will be safer

Reviews.Title: TOSHIBA SATELLITE L745-S4110 14 IN LAPTOP
Reviews.Author: Misty Jolynn Thourot "Misty Jo"
Reviews.Content: I HAVE THIS LAPTOP AND I LOVE IT!!!!!!!!!!!! EVERYTIME I TURN AROUND I FIND ANOTHER COOL THING IT DOES, ITS NOT MY FIRST LAPTOP BUT ITS DEFINETLY MY FAVORITE. ENJOY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
